extendedInfo.description: Fantastic Heroes is the perfect blend of Side-scrolling Action RPG and your favorite Social Games!- Expand your territory and assemble a team of heroes to fight monsters! - When you're tired of battling monsters, you can attack your friends!- Fantastic Heroes is funâ¦ but even more fun with friends! Play now!You can also play in íêµ­ì´, æ¥æ¬èª, and ä¸­æç®ä½, ä¸­æç¹é«.What is Fantastic Heroes?A Side-Scrolling Action RPG!- Take in the jaw-dropping action and special effects as you battle monsters and friends!- Upgrade your Heroes and give them awesome items!- Rule and build up your territory!- Get social and play with friends!Multitudes of Heroes!- Assemble your team of heroes, each possessing their individual skills.- Train your heroes to be the best by increasing their stats and skill points! Make your heroes more powerful with upgraded weapons! - Acquire Magic and Rare Items from the Dungeon, and strengthen them in the forge. - Use upgraded weapons to make your heroes more powerful than ever! Rule your territory and construct buildings! - Construct Production buildings, Functional buildings, and Deco buildings to liven up your territory! Get social and play with friends! - Fight battles, give gifts, support, and help your friends to get Popular! Over 300 Quests and Achievements to unlock! - Challenge yourself to complete hundreds of quests and achievements!* Items can be purchased in this game. reviews.title: Brawler rpg
reviews.comment: Game involves building territory to amass gold using a typical kingdom/city/farm building layout. Battles are side scroller brawler action. You get controllable characters through a draw system and obtain gear for them through shops or battles. Sounds like a lot but it\'s actually very easy to pick up and all the elements come together naturally. I like it ^^
